HeroSection.title: I'M ROMARIC AKODJENOU.
HeroSection.description: I am a full-stack developer specializing in creating modern and high-performance web interfaces. Focused on innovation and efficiency, I design solutions tailored to users' needs to enhance their daily experience.

responsibilities.1: Development of showcase site and web application.

responsibilities.0: Development of responsive and interactive user interfaces.
Development of responsive and interactive user interfaces.
Development of an employee management application for a company (requests, leaves, permissions, etc.).
responsibilities.1: Development of an automation and optimization application for the archiving process.
responsibilities.2: Creation and integration of REST APIs.

responsibilities.0: Development of a user interface module for an e-commerce application.

dev.title: Web Application Development
dev.description: Development of responsive and interactive websites using both frontend and backend JavaScript technologies.

api.title: Creation and Use of REST APIs
api.description: Design and implementation of robust API interfaces to enable efficient communication between different systems.

integration.title: Web Integration
integration.description: Converting design mockups (PSD, Figma, XD) into functional, responsive websites with clean and optimized code.

template.title: Template Integration and Usage
template.description: Use and customization of templates to speed up development and maintain visual consistency.

doc.title: Technical Documentation Writing
doc.description: Creation of clear and comprehensive documentation to facilitate understanding and maintenance of applications.

maintenance.title: IT Maintenance
maintenance.description: Technical support and maintenance of software to ensure continuous performance and reliability.

timer.title: Timer
timer.description: Timer for managing time and tasks.
